case.title: Something different - 23 (England)
case.text: Good morning, I'm looking for something a little different or maybe special.. ok so about me, I'm curvy, with pale skin, big Brown eyes and long hair. I have a very, very demanding job and I own my own business- madness I know!!! For the last 5years I've spilt my time between England and France. When I'm not working, I love to be outside, walk my dogs, listen to music and travel. At heart I'm a bit of a gypsy!! I'm looking for a guy, that is happy to deal with my crazy work load, loves dogs and isn't controlling or arrogant. I'm very hard working, loyal and loving. Send me a message if your interested x
